class_notes: This section is for MN+MSN semester 2 students only.
course_description: Using a family centered approach; students address the unique responses of children and their families to acute and chronic illness. Emphasis is on health teaching, promotion, restoration and health maintenance needs of children and their families.

M 2:15pm-5:15pm in Nursing School - 201
F 2pm-5pm in Nursing School - 201
